parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the response. Valid values:

- zh: Chinese

- en: English

Default value: en.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The token that is used to start the next query. It is returned in the response to the previous query.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: A list of resource IDs. In this case, a list of zone IDs. You can specify up to 50 IDs.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: The resource type. Set the value to ZONE.

parameters.name: Size
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Maximum value: 200. Default value: 20.
